item.title: Bitget adopts the Chainlink Proof of Reserve scheme to enhance BGBTC asset transparency
item.description: On August 20th, Bitget announced the implementation of a Chainlink-backed Proof of Reserve solution, offering real-time transparency and verifiable reserve guarantees for its Bitcoin-pegged asset BGBTC.According to reports, the Chainlink Proof of Reserve solution independently validates the reserve balance behind tokenized assets via a decentralized oracle network, bringing real-world asset reserve data onto the blockchain. This guarantees that the reserve backing BGBTC does not rely on manual disclosure and can be subject to independent audits at any time. This mechanism will also further support the use of BGBTC in BitVault Finance's DeFi yield strategies and lending products, enabling retail and institutional users to confirm that the reserve behind the asset is under continuous monitoring.Bitget CEO Gracy Chen stated: "Transparency is of great importance in the digital asset industry. By adopting Chainlink's Proof of Reserve solution, we have provided greater trust assurances t

item.title: Source: InsiderInsider sources: U.S. CFTC nominee Brian Quintenz's nomination is stalled, with multiple cryptocurrency industry organizations jointly supporting him.
item.description: On August 20th. According to crypto reporter Eleanor Terrett, Brian Quintenz, the nominee for the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), has recently taken the initiative to get in touch with members of the crypto industry to hold a meeting after his nomination was stalled for three weeks. Since the Senate Judiciary Committee postponed his confirmation hearing three weeks ago, the White House has remained silent without making any comments.Meanwhile, several industry organizations such as the Digital Chamber, Blockchain Association, Crypto Council, and Fund DeFi are preparing a joint letter of support, which is anticipated to be submitted to President Trump as early as tomorrow regarding his nomination.

item.title: Data: Ethereum Staking Amount has decreased by a net of 43,873 ETH in the past week, equivalent to approximately $178 million.
item.description: On August 20th, based on the data from the Validator Queue tracking website validatorqueue, the staking amount of Ethereum has decreased from 35.651 million ETH to 35.607 million ETH within the past week. This represents a net decrease of 43,873 ETH, which is approximately worth $1.78 billion.Furthermore, as of the moment of writing, the current exit queue of the Ethereum PoS network is temporarily reported to be 916,647 ETH, and it remains at a historical high.

item.title: Estimated Ethereum Staking Costs for BMNR and SBET: $3730 and $3478 respectively
item.description: August 20th. On-chain analyst Yu Jin calculated the Ethereum buying costs of BitMine and SharpLink. Based on the announced purchases since the beginning of ETH reserves by BitMine and SharpLink, the calculations are as follows:BitMine (BMNR) began buying ETH on 7/9. As of 8/17, it held 1,523,373 ETH with an average cost of $3,730.SharpLink (SBET) started buying ETH on 6/13. By 8/17, it held 740,760 ETH and had an average cost of $3,478.

item.title: 「Yeezy Coin」 Trader Liquidates Position, Loses $704,000 in 3 Hours
item.description: August 20th. According to on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), the "Betting on Kanye Concept Meme Coin YZY" trader transferred all 27.72 million tokens to the address 51mwU...bw5DG 7 hours ago. Subsequently, they sold all the tokens in 48 transactions with an average price of $0.002103 (cost basis $0.02767), resulting in a loss of $704,000 within 3 hours.

item.title: Insider: Musk Pauses Formation of New Political Party, Continues to Seek Connection with Vance
item.description: On August 20th, as reported by The Wall Street Journal, Elon Musk has decelerated his plans to establish the "America Party" as a third political party. Those with knowledge of the matter stated that Musk is currently inclined to concentrate on the operation of his companies and is cautious about forming a party because he is reluctant to divert votes from the Republican Party. The sources indicated that Musk has been attempting to maintain communication with American Vice President Pence.Previously, Musk had declared that the new party aimed to restore voter "freedom," but recently informed his allies that he is not currently proceeding with related actions.

item.title: Analysis: Bitcoin 30-Day Option Delta Skew Skyrockets, Indicating Market is in Extreme Fear
item.description: On August 20th, according to Deribit data, the Bitcoin 30-day option Delta skew (put-call) skyrocketed to 12%, attaining its highest level in more than four months. In a neutral situation, this indicator typically fluctuates between -6% and +6%, which reflects the balanced pricing of call (buy) and put (sell) options. When the level is above 10%, it indicates extreme market fear, but such situations seldom last.Previously, this indicator soared to 13% on April 7th, when Bitcoin fell below $74,500 for the first time in five months. Subsequently, risk-taking investors reaped a 40% return in the following month, with Bitcoin rising to $104,150 on May 8th.Cointelegraph's analysis suggests that there is no evidence indicating the end of Bitcoin's bull market. Traders' fear often exceeds rational expectations. In fact, this cryptocurrency may even benefit from potential outflows from the stock market, suggesting that the current turmoil will not counteract the market's long-term bullish

item.title: At the end of July, a whale bought $20.08 million worth of ETH at an average price of $3958 and swapped it for WBTC.
item.description: On August 20th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), at the end of July, a whale accumulated $20.8 million worth of ETH with an average price of $3958 and then repositioned into WBTC.During yesterday's price drop, the whale directly sold 1200 ETH ($4.97 million) at $4,147.86, realizing a profit of $228,000. The remaining 3900 ETH was swapped for 143.26 WBTC two hours ago. At that time, ETH was selling at $4169 and WBTC was buying at $113,493.

item.title: Trump Urges Powell to Cut Rates Again: "Too Late to Be Mr. Hawk"
item.description: On August 20th, President Trump once again posted on his Truth platform, urging Powell to cut interest rates. He said, "Could someone kindly inform Jerome *Too Late* Powell that his actions are causing great harm to the real estate industry? People are unable to obtain mortgages due to him. However, all indications suggest that there was no inflation before, and a significant rate cut is needed. 'Too Late' is a disaster!"

item.title: Early Leader Coin Market-wide Downturn, ZORA Plunges Over 19% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 20th, according to market data, previously strong coins witnessed a general decline today. These include: ZORA, which saw a daily decline of 19.3% and is now trading at $0.08834; SKALE, with a daily decrease of 11% and currently trading at $0.03063; XNY, experiencing a daily decrease of 26.9% and now trading at $0.01078; and MYX, which had a daily decrease of 24.9% and is now trading at $1.08.
